name: NEORUNNERS
description:
Take part in this ever changing 3D platformer-inspired roguelike race full of surprises. Play solo, with friends or the community at large to compete for the longest run ever.

A Dynamic Race!

An endless dynamic course with generated and crafted sections. Run and jump your way across increasingly difficult platforms and stages. Multiple challenging obstacles and traps are littered throughout the course. Collect hearts for lives to extend your run.

Obstacles, traps and surprises!
From moving platforms to electric fences, care where you land or fall to your demise.

Roguelike!
Reach milestones to modify your character stats and gain bonuses.

Friends or Enemies!
Play solo, with friends or the whole community with easy matchmaking.

Stats and Leaderboards!
Track your progress and compare yourself with the community with stats and leaderboards.

Ranked Matches Coming Soon!
